issue.title: [Java] Refactor the compression codec implementation into core/Arrow specific parts
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11899](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11899). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This issue is in response to the discussion in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8949/files#r588049088

We want to refactor the compression codec related code into two parts: one for the core compression logic, and the other for Arrow specific logic.

This will make it easier to support other compression types.
